The nJord Platform has miscellaneous functions for setting up the execution environment and handling errors. These functions are exposed from the win32s module.

 * [SetEnv]
 * [GetEnv]
 * [GetLastError]
 * [GetLastErrorMessage]
 * [SetCurrentDirectory]
 * [GetCurrentDirectory]
 * [SetDllDirectory]
 * [MessageBox]
 * [Sleep]
